title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; chat, generate, and embed with local Ollama models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat provider inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat history, multi-model convos, PDF ingestion, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + ChromaDB + LangChain to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull models, and stream responses in Kotlin/Java.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus compose stacks for Ollama + WebUI + CUDA runtime.

title: ollama-nvidia-nim
summary: Bridge to run Ollama models under NVIDIA NIM inference microservice format for enterprise Triton users.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama’s REST API; includes chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama + GPU in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that talks to Ollama; supports multi-model selection and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-reddit discussion
summary: Reddit thread announcing Ollama v0.1.40 with native function-calling/tool-use support.

title: ollama-hackernews launch
summary: Hacker News discussion on Ollama’s launch of Windows support and new model library.
